definitions.definition: an open sore on an external or internal surface of the body, caused by a break in the skin or mucous membrane that fails to heal.
examples: sore, ulceration, abscess, boil, carbuncle, blister, gumboil, cyst; Moreaphtha, chancre, furuncle "something to soothe the ulcers in his mouth"Moreaphtha, chancre, furuncle something to soothe the ulcers in his mouth

definitions.definition: a moral blemish or corrupting influence.
examples: he's a con man with an incurable ulcer called gambling
